Title: OnePlus Pad 3 arrives with Snapdragon 8 Elite inside
Description:
OnePlus has launched the Pad 3, the first tablet outside of China powered by the flagship Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
It’s been upsized since the Pad 2, with a larger 13.2-inch display, but that’s allowed OnePlus to make it impressively thin at just 5.97mm.
T…

Title: The First ‘Wicked: For Good’ Trailer Promises Change
Description: Return to Oz as Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande dazzle and despair in our first look at the 'Wicked' sequel.

Title: Lego’s Amazing ‘One Piece’ Sets Set Course for This Summer
Description: Based on the Netflix adaptation of the smash-hit manga and anime, a whole host of fun sets are coming for your booty this August.

Title: Amazon Is Going All In, This PlayStation VR Bundle With Horizon Call of the Mountain Now Costs Peanuts
Description: It’s ten times cheaper than the Apple Vision Pro and still feels very real for VR.

Title: I used the OnePlus 13s for a month — it is the compact iPhone clone you've never wanted
Description:
OnePlus just rolled out a compact flagship, and it has a lot to offer.
The phone shares the same silicon as the OnePlus 13, and you get the 13R's main camera and a massive battery.
But the design is just emulating the iPhone, and the software is nowhere close…

Title: Trump issues a new travel ban. And, GOP raises concerns over the budget bill
Description:
Trump has signed a proclamation banning travelers from a dozen countries starting on Monday.
And, Elon Musk's criticism of the budget bill is raising GOP concerns.

Title: International students look to the U.K. instead of the U.S. amid Trump's visa plans
Description:
Planned U.S.
visa restrictions are causing students around the world to consider going to the United Kingdom instead.

Title: Meta's tech chief says it's time for Silicon Valley to embrace the military again
Description: Meta recently announced it was partnering with Anduril, a defense tech startup, on a US military project.

Title: How the boss of Ikea gives his workers permission to fail
Description: Jesper Brodin of Ingka Group gives out "banana cards" to staff in a bid to promote innovation by allowing them to fail without fearing the consequences.

Title: DA says 40 UnitedHealthcare execs got bodyguards, and one dyed her hair after Luigi Mangione killed CEO Brian Thompson
Description: Luigi Mangione's lawyers previously told the court their client, who is charged with killing UnitedHealthcare's Brian Thompson, is not a terrorist.

Title: Fishing Communities in the Philippines Are Fighting for their Future as Waters Rise
Description: As sea levels rise, coastal families in the Philippines tackle the fear of displacement—and what it means for the next generation.

Title: Justis Huni: Fabio Wardley's home crowd won't scare me -- my house was shot up
Description: Justis Huni will face by far the toughest test of his career against Fabio Wardley on Saturday, but it will be a walk in the park compared to some of the things he's faced outside the ring.

Title: Trump’s De-legalization Campaign
Description: After a Supreme Court decision, hundreds of thousands of immigrants who followed the law are among the easiest to deport, Jack Herrera writes.

Title: Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour, Which Everyone Thinks Should Be Free, Requires $95 of Accessories and a 4K TV for 100% Completion
Description: Nintendo's $10 Switch 2 mini-game collection — the game that many fans believe should have been free — requires you own at least $95 of accessories in order to complete 100%.

Title: 10 Years of Betting on Rust
Description:
I wrote my first line of Rust in June 2015, a month after Rust 1.0 landed.
Coming from C, Python, and JavaScript, I never looked back.
Two Rust-based startups and 500k lines of Rust later, here are some reflections on the milestone.

Title: Meta raises the bar for Apple’s AI glasses ambitions
Description:
Today, Meta shared (via The Verge) a few new details about Aria Gen 2, its next-generation experimental smart glasses.
While they’re still not meant for consumers, the hardware show just how fast Meta is moving and how far ahead it is thinking when it come…

Title: Nintendo Switch 2 now available for purchase online!
Description:
Nintendo Switch 2 has now officially released and is available for purchase online (or will be very soon – midnight ET).
Years in the making, and years of waiting, it has finally happened and the next-generation of Nintendo gaming is now out in the wild.
